wait for movement

reset camera
</finish action>

description:

note: <Instant Cast>

description:
Applies \C[2]Death Mark\C[0] on target foe for 3 turns. When it expires, 
deals 50% of total damage user dealt during its duration.
name: Death Mark
note: <Instant>

description:
User jumps into the air and becomes unselectable. 
2 turns later, the user lands and damages target foe.
name: Jump
note:
// Action Sequences
// Setup: Jump animation.
<Setup Action>
display action
camera focus: user
zoom: 150%
perform start
wait: 60
se: Wind1, 80, 150
float user: 495%, 20
opacity user: 0%, 20
wait for float
</Setup Action>

// Whole: Ensure nothing happens.
<Whole Action>
</Whole Action>

// Target: Flag the target.
<Target Action>
action effect
</Target Action>

// Follow: Apply Jump state to user.
<Follow Action>
add state 39: user
</Follow Action>

// Finish: Without landing.
<Finish Action>
clear battle log
reset camera
reset zoom
wait for camera
wait for zoom
</Finish Action>

description: This skill is the skill used when landing
name: Land
note:
// Action Sequence
// Setup: Setup landing spot.
<Setup Action>
clear battle log
display action
immortal: targets, true
move user: target, base, 1
</Setup Action>

// Whole: Land and deal damage to all targets.
<Whole Action>
camera focus: target
zoom: 150%
wait: 60
motion attack: user
opacity user: 100%, 1
float user: 0, 20
wait: 10
animation 2: targets
action effect
shake screen: 5, 5, 5
wait for animation
</Whole Action>

// Target: Ensure nothing happens.
<Target Action>
</Target Action>

// Follow: Reset everything.
<Follow Action>
reset camera
reset zoom
jump user: 200%, 30
move user: return, 30
wait for movement
</Follow Action>

description:
Activates the power of the Runeblade for 1 round, drawing 
in and absorbing magical attacks.
name: Runic Blade

description: <WordWrap>User tries to \c[4]steal\c[0] a weapon from target foe with a \c[4]+10% Success Rate\c[0].
name: Steal Weapon
note:
<Cast Animation: 0>
<Snatch Weapon: +100%>

<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets, true
</setup action>

<target action>
move user: targets, front, 20
motion standby: user
wait for movement
face user: target
action animation: target
move user: targets, base, 10
motion thrust: user, no weapon
wait: 15
action effect
jump user: 50, 10
move user: targets, front, 10
face user: forward
</target action>

<Custom Steal Success Effect>
user._successfulSteals = user._successfulSteals || 0;
user._successfulSteals += 1;
</Custom Steal Success Effect>

note:
<Damage Formula>
// Check if the target is a boss
if (b.isStateCategoryAffected('boss')) {
  // Damage formula used if the target is a boss.
  value = a.mat * 6;
} else {
  // Damage formula used if the target isn't a boss.
  value = b.hp * 0.50;
}
</Damage Formula>

description: Halves the target's HP

// Check if the target is a boss

  // Damage formula used if the target is a boss.

  // Damage formula used if the target isn't a boss.
  value = b.hp * 0.50;
}
</Damage Formula>

description:
\C[4]Madilyn\C[0] unlocks her demon powers. Lasts for 
6 turns. \C[6]Instant Cast\C[0]
name: Transform
note: <Instant Cast>

description:
Deals damage and attempts to afflict a myriad of 
debuffs on 2 random enemies.
name: Affliction

description:
Protects party members from the next strike of \C[8]Dark\C[0] 
energy. Only works on \C[8]Dark\C[0] energy attacks.
name: Gaia Shell

description: Deals high amounts of \C[8]Dark\C[0] damage to all targets.
name: Gaia Blast

description:
Stuns and deals a large amount of damage to the target with a \C[6]50%\C[0] miss chance. 
If the action misses, the user's \C[6]agi\C[0] is debuffed for 4 rounds.
name: Gamble Strike
note:
// This moves the user forward to the enemy or slightly forward depending on the weapon type.
<Whole Action>
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
 move user: targets, front, 20
else
 perform start
end
</Whole Action>

// Makes user attack the enemy. If the enemy evades, debuff the user's AGI.
<target action>
motion standby: user
wait for movement
face user: target
motion attack: user
wait: 10
attack animation: target
wait for animation
action effect
if target.result().missed || target.result().evaded
  add agi debuff: user, 5, show
  animation 54: user
  motion dead: user
  wait for animation
end
</target action>

description: For 5 turns, greatly boost DEF and MDF for party.
name: Defensive Shell

description: Recovers 50% of MaxMP.
name: Magic Torrent

description:
Revives a fallen ally with all of their HP and grants 
them a protective barrier for 2 turns.
name: Raise III
note: <Target Barrier 2 Turns: +500>

description:

dealt back as healing.

note: <Limit Uses: 1>

description: Restores a large amount of HP to all allies.
